name: DayGenie
0:
”Alexa, ask Day Genie what is the first day of next month”
”Alexa, ask Day Genie when is the first Saturday of next month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: day genie
des: Quickly find when is the first monday, weekend or some other day for the next month. You can also ask it to tell you what day of the week is the first of next month
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
